name: 3D Boat Parking Simulator Game - Real Sailing Driving Test Run Marina Park Sim Games.
name_original: 3D Boat Parking Simulator Game - Real Sailing Driving Test Run Marina Park Sim Games.
description:
Take to the seas in 3D Boat Parking Simulator: Marina edition! With brand new water physics and beautiful graphics, take the helm on 4 totally unique ships, including a sleek speed boat, a traditional sailing yacht, a beautiful luxury motorboat and a twin hull catamaran! Feel the thrill of sailing and navigating your ships safely whilst parking without damaging any expensive boats in the Marina! :)
So put on your Captains Hat and set sail today. All Levels are 100% Free for ALL THESE FANTASTIC SHIPS!
▶ Speed Boat: Nimble and fun to drive - the perfect boat to start your seafaring career!
▶ Sailing Yacht: Take a gentler pace with the elegant sailing yacht! Get used to steering well in advance.
▶ Luxury Motoryacht: With More power, comes more responsibility! Take the expensive luxury yacht out for a spin.
▶ Catamaran: For the bravest captains, the huge twin-hull Catamaran will test your precision sailing to the limits.
Experience the newest Parking Simulator from the masters of Parking Games! Often imitated, never bettered!
Extra Fun Game Modes are available as In-App Purchases - each have their own leader boards, and change the Rules slightly to make for an easier ride!

GAME FEATURES
▶ Realistic water physics to test your skills with 4 challenging boat types
▶ Beautiful Marina environment to explore
▶ Realtime Lighting and Reflections
▶ Customisable control methods (tilt, buttons, wheel)
▶ Many camera views to help you park
▶ Fun, Kids and Baby modes for an easier trip!
▶ Leader Boards for each Game Mode
▶ How many Stars can you get? Test yourself to get a Gold award for every level!
▶ iOS Optimisation: runs perfectly on anything from the iPad 1, iPhone 4 and iPod Touch 4th Gen or better, with full iPhone 5 widescreen support.
